function.name: hoodFanSpeedLevel_setValue
function.description: This function is used to set the fan speed of the hood to a specific numeric value.

location.description: The location where the device is located.

room.description: The room where the device is located.

device.description: The name or type of the device to set the fan speed.

hoodFanSpeedLevel.description: The specific numeric value to set the fan speed.
